name: Executive Fungal Extraction Force (E.F.E.F.)
description:
E.F.E.F.: Executive Fungal Extraction Force

Created for Mini Jam 128: Health in March 2023 with a limitation of "The only way to go is up".

The president has eaten some bad sushi, so it is up to you to enter your nanoship and try and eliminate all the fungus among us while working your way up the presidential intestine!

Whew, what a jam! Despite a large number of technical hurdles in our way at every turn, we are very proud of the game we ended up with. Also, we started work late so we were a day behind on both development and submission. As usual, we would have liked to have had more time for stage design and game balance, as well as more player powerups.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows MoveZ / L / Space / LMBShootP / EscPause

Designed by SAWD Games and luisdenpixel

Programmed by Justin Chartier and John Day

Artistic direction and graphics by luisdenpixel

https://www.fiverr.com/luisdenpixel/create-quality-pixel-art-of-anything-you-wan...

Music:

Main Menu: Applying to the academy by Malachi The Artist

Level 1: Trying to beat the clock by Malachi The Artist

Level 2: Report to the high commander by Malachi The Artist

Final area: Akira's chase scene by Malachi The Artist

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwJyPspoj23FtwsPp3hBzdw 

SFX by OwlishMedia

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effect-pack
